The expression of utter shock and disbelief on the two Clanners' faces 
was obvious. It seemed as though Owlhawk had destroyed a whole Clan by 
clapping hands.

Katya: This... is... Terra?!?!

Ragnar: Prehistoric Earth?!?! By the blood of Kerensky! The thing that 
hit us during the duel must surely have done this!

Katya: Yes... Stravag! (<-this is a curse) Vlad!

Ragnar: What Vlad? Is he somewhere near?

Katya: I do not know, but if he is on this planet, he will surely 
proclaim himself the Ilkhan if he comes to know about this place! I 
have to prevent it!

Ragnar: Prevent it? You are the loremaster of his Clan and you want to 
prevent him to make you the IlClan?

She fell silent for a few seconds.

Katya: There are many things you do not know, Star Colonel... (She 
turned to Owlhawk) I do not know your name, but we want to see your 
commanding officer. What is going on is far beyond you, but maybe we 
can all help us.
